page.title: 12GUITING POWER.THE DOCTOR
page.content: There are 5 doctors,4 nurses and 7500 patients in our doctor's practice. The doctors cover a wide area and hold surgeries in 7 villages. They are responsible for 16 general hospital beds,18 geriatric beds and 12 dayroom cases. They dispense their own medicines, and drugs come from Cheltenham or Birmingham. There are also chemists in Bourton-on-the-Water,Northleach and Stow. Our doctor trained at Cambridge Medical School and the Middlesex Hospital.He works from 8.30a.m.until after 7p.m.He attends surgeries and does home and hospital visits. Our nearest hospital is at Bourton- on-the-Water, but the main hospital is at Cheltenham, 12 miles away.
